com.interpss.core.algo.dclf

Interface IPowerTDFactor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ContingencyAnalysisAlgorithm, NetGenAdjustAlgorithm, SenAnalysisAlgorithm
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContingencyAnalysisAlgorithmImpl, NetGenAdjustAlgorithmImpl, SenAnalysisAlgorithmImpl

    public interface IPowerTDFactor
extends org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject
    A representation of the model object 'IPower TD Factor'. Interface of PTDF calculation methods for one injection bus and one or a set of withdraw buses for a branch or all branches in the network.
    See Also:
    DclfAlgorithmPackage.getIPowerTDFactor()

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double pTransferDistFactor(java.lang.String injectBusId, AclfBranch branch)
      Get power transfer distribution factor with inject bus and Ref bus as the withdraw bus for the monitoring branch.
      double pTransferDistFactor(java.lang.String injectBusId, java.lang.String withdrawBusId, AclfBranch branch)
      Get power transfer distribution factor with inject bus and withdraw bus list for a monitoring branch.
      double[] pTransferDistFactors(java.lang.String injectBusId, java.lang.String withdrawBusId)
      Get power transfer distribution factors for all branches in the network with inject bus and withdraw bus.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject

    • Method Detail

      • pTransferDistFactor

        double pTransferDistFactor(java.lang.String injectBusId,
                           java.lang.String withdrawBusId,
                           AclfBranch branch)
                    throws InterpssException
        Get power transfer distribution factor with inject bus and withdraw bus list for a monitoring branch. The monitoring branch might be out-of-service for branch closure outage analysis.
        Parameters:
        injectBusId - injection bus id
        withdrawBusId - withdraw bus id
        branch - the monitoring branch
        Throws:
        InterpssException

      • pTransferDistFactors

        double[] pTransferDistFactors(java.lang.String injectBusId,
                              java.lang.String withdrawBusId)
                       throws InterpssException
        Get power transfer distribution factors for all branches in the network with inject bus and withdraw bus.
        Parameters:
        injectBusId - injection bus id
        withdrawBusId - withdraw bus id
        Throws:
        InterpssException

      • pTransferDistFactor

        double pTransferDistFactor(java.lang.String injectBusId,
                           AclfBranch branch)
                    throws InterpssException
        Get power transfer distribution factor with inject bus and Ref bus as the withdraw bus for the monitoring branch. The monitoring branch might be out-of-service for branch closure outage analysis.
        Parameters:
        injectBusId - injection bus id
        branch - monitoring branch
        Throws:
        InterpssException
